      • update

        public void update(double dt)
        Update all objects within the scene, ie aircraft, orders box altimeter. Cause collision detection to occur Generate a new flight if flight generation interval has been exceeded.
        Specified by:
        update  in class  Scene
        Parameters:
        dt - the delta time since the last update was carried out

        Cause all planes in airspace to update collisions Catch and handle a resultant game over state
        Parameters:

      • playSound

        public void playSound(audio.Sound sound)
        Description copied from class:  Scene
        Plays a sound effect Can be used by a scene's object to request a sound to be played, e.g. aircraft can request a warning beep when their separation radius is infringed.
        Specified by:
        playSound  in class  Scene
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound to be played

      • aircraftSelectableAtAltitude

        private boolean aircraftSelectableAtAltitude(Aircraft a,
                                   int altitude)
        Decide which aircraft are selectable at the current control altitude Aircraft must be on the current control altitude, or changing altitude towards it
        Parameters:
        a - an aircraft to be checked for selectability
        altitude - the current control altitude
        Returns:
        whether or not the aircraft is selectable at the current control altitude

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from class:  Scene
        Used to cleanly exit a scene, e.g. halting the scene's music so it does not overlap the next scene's music Runs once only when a scene is closed

        close  in class  Scene
